name: MiniGame Dash
description:
A short game based on the theme Warioware.

There are 3 mini games in total, after playing one for a few seconds the game switches. And as you keep playing the difficulty increases!!

Play On Liluo-  MiniGame Dash | Play on Liluo.io

Controls:  W,A,S,D and Mouse

Credits-

Music- HoliznaCC0 - Dance Till You Die,HoliznaCC0 - Red Skies from https://freemusicarchive.org/
